query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS test_invitations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_assignment_id INT NOT NULL,
  candidate_id INT NOT NULL,
  recruiter_id INT NOT NULL,
  invitation_token VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  email_sent BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  email_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  opened_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  expires_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  reminder_sent BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  reminder_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'sent', 'opened', 'expired') DEFAULT 'pending',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (test_assignment_id) REFERENCES test_assignments(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id) REFERENCES candidates(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (recruiter_id) REFERENCES recruiters(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)

  FOREIGN KEY (test_assignment_id) REFERENCES test_assignments(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id) REFERENCES candidates(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,

)
